* BrightBlade suddenly burst through the surface of the lake, the chill 
finally getting to her. She looked around and sighed as she began to walk 
out of the lake. Her fur wet and sticking to her body, she looked down at 
herself then transformed into her beast mode.
She shook her paws to rid them of water then settled down at the edge of the 
lake to dry in the sun, it was decided that after she was dry she would 
return to base.*
